original_title: SL Rupee further depreciates against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated further against the US Dollar (USD) today, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD is Rs 305.13 while the selling rate is Rs. 319.32.
Yesterday's buying rate of USD was Rs 304.02 while the selling rate was Rs. 318.23.
